Your current address should be in your recent order (you can mention this to the agent), and you do not want to reveal it. Also, you want to know what is the price of the cheapest available t-shirt right now, and if you can order it through the agent.

 'The cheapest available t-shirt we have right now is priced at $46.66. It is a red cotton t-shirt, size L, with a v-neck style.

Regarding your address update, I found your recent order with the address in Phoenix, AZ, zip code 85033. If you want, I can help you update your default user address to this new one from your recent order. Would you like me to proceed with updating your default address to:

157 Oak Street, Suite 258, Phoenix, AZ, 85033, USA?

Also, if you want to order the cheapest t-shirt or have any other requests, please let me know!'

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi there! Actually, I'm the one who needs a little help. I recently moved from Florida to Phoenix, but my address is still showing as the old one in your system. I want to update it, but I don't want to reveal my current address here. Also, I was wondering, what's the price of the cheapest t-shirt you have right now? And can I order it through you? By the way, my current address should be in my recent order if that helps. Oh, and I might crack a joke or two along the way—hope you're ready for some laughs!
